name: Helmet
description: Constructed with high quality EPS encased by PVC for top-tier protection. All Retrospec bike helmets are tested at a CPSC and EN lab for safety.

name: Tire
description: Carbon steel bead allows tire to be folded without damage for easy storag Bell tires are ultra durable and made for adventure. The tires will stand the test of time, ride after ride.

name: Disc Brake
description: HYBRID BRAKE AND EASY TO INSTALL AND FIX-The Juin Tech F1 isn't a straightforward mechanical disc brake though, it's a hybrid or cable-operated hydraulic.
